headline: London’s Police Force to Recruit 40% of Officers From Minority Backgrounds
text: LONDON — The London Metropolitan Police will aim to hire 40 percent of new recruits from Black, Asian and other minority backgrounds by 2022, Mayor Sadiq Khan said on Friday, the centerpiece of a sweeping effort to make the city’s main police force more representative as it tries to address accusations of racism and discriminatory practices against minorities.
snippet: The Metropolitan Police also announced a review of all road traffic stops, as Commissioner Cressida Dick acknowledged that her force was “not free from racism or discrimination.”
